titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious letter to the Parliament of Scotland Together with the lord high commissioner and lord high chancellors speeches.
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
England and Wales, Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Loo the 4th of October 1700. and of our reign the 12 year. By His Majesties command, sic subscribitur, Ro. Pringle.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
